name: risk
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: This API request returns core metrics to measure the risk of investing in a mutual fund.

Availability: Mega plan
Data weighting: 200 API credits per symbol

symbol.description: The symbol ticker of the mutual fund.

dp.description: The number of decimal places for floating values. Defaults to None.

country.description: Filter results by country name or alpha code. Defaults to None.
